approve_with_id.instructions: The payment should be attempted again. If it still cannot be processed, the customer needs to contact their bank.
approve_with_id.customer_instructions: The payment should be attempted again. If it still cannot be processed, you need to contact your bank.

call_issuer.description: The card has been declined for an unknown reason.
call_issuer.instructions: The customer needs to contact their bank for more information.
call_issuer.customer_instructions: You need to contact your bank for more information.

card_not_supported.description: The card does not support this type of purchase.
card_not_supported.instructions: The customer needs to contact their bank to make sure their card can be used to make this type of purchase.
card_not_supported.customer_instructions: You need to contact your bank to make sure your card can be used to make this type of purchase.

card_velocity_exceeded.description: The customer has exceeded the balance or credit limit available on their card.
card_velocity_exceeded.instructions: The customer should contact their bank for more information.
card_velocity_exceeded.customer_instructions: You need to contact your bank for more information.

currency_not_supported.description: The card does not support the specified currency.
currency_not_supported.instructions: The customer needs check with the issuer that the card can be used for the type of currency specified.
currency_not_supported.customer_instructions: You need to contact your bank to ensure that the card can be used for the type of currency specified.

do_not_honor.description: The card has been declined for an unknown reason.
do_not_honor.instructions: The customer needs to contact their bank for more information.
do_not_honor.customer_instructions: You need to contact your bank for more information.

do_not_try_again.description: The card has been declined for an unknown reason.
do_not_try_again.instructions: The customer should contact their bank for more information.
do_not_try_again.customer_instructions: You need to contact your bank for more information.

duplicate_transaction.description: A transaction with identical amount and credit card information was submitted very recently.
duplicate_transaction.instructions: Check to see if a recent payment already exists.
duplicate_transaction.customer_instructions: Check to see if a recent payment already exists.

expired_card.instructions: The customer should use another card.

fraudulent.description: The payment has been declined as Stripe suspects it is fraudulent.
fraudulent.instructions: Do not report more detailed information to your customer. Instead, present as you would the generic_decline described below.
fraudulent.customer_instructions: You need to contact your bank for more information.

generic_decline.description: The card has been declined for an unknown reason.
generic_decline.instructions: The customer needs to contact their bank for more information.
generic_decline.customer_instructions: You need to contact your bank for more information.

incorrect_number.instructions: The customer should try again using the correct card number.
incorrect_number.customer_instructions: You should try again using the correct card number.

incorrect_cvc.instructions: The customer should try again using the correct CVC.
incorrect_cvc.customer_instructions: You should try again using the correct CVC.

incorrect_pin.description: The PIN entered is incorrect. This decline code only applies to payments made with a card reader.
incorrect_pin.instructions: The customer should try again using the correct PIN.
incorrect_pin.customer_instructions: You should try again using the correct PIN.

incorrect_zip.instructions: The customer should try again using the correct billing ZIP/postal code.

insufficient_funds.description: The card has insufficient funds to complete the purchase.
insufficient_funds.instructions: The customer should use an alternative payment method.
insufficient_funds.customer_instructions: You should use an alternative payment method.

invalid_account.description: The card, or account the card is connected to, is invalid.
invalid_account.instructions: The customer needs to contact their bank to check that the card is working correctly.
invalid_account.customer_instructions: You need to contact your bank for more information.

invalid_amount.description: The payment amount is invalid, or exceeds the amount that is allowed.
invalid_amount.instructions: If the amount appears to be correct, the customer needs to check with their bank that they can make purchases of that amount.
invalid_amount.customer_instructions: You need to contact your bank for more information.

invalid_cvc.instructions: The customer should try again using the correct CVC.
invalid_cvc.customer_instructions: You should try again using the correct CVC.

invalid_expiry_year.instructions: The customer should try again using the correct expiration date.
invalid_expiry_year.customer_instructions: You should try again using the correct expiration date.

invalid_number.instructions: The customer should try again using the correct card number.
invalid_number.customer_instructions: You should try again using the correct card number.

invalid_pin.description: The PIN entered is incorrect. This decline code only applies to payments made with a card reader.
invalid_pin.instructions: The customer should try again using the correct PIN.
invalid_pin.customer_instructions: You should try again using the correct PIN.

issuer_not_available.description: The card issuer could not be reached, so the payment could not be authorized.
issuer_not_available.instructions: The payment should be attempted again. If it still cannot be processed, the customer needs to contact their bank.
issuer_not_available.customer_instructions: The payment should be attempted again. If it still cannot be processed, you need to contact your bank.

lost_card.description: The payment has been declined because the card is reported lost.
lost_card.instructions: The specific reason for the decline should not be reported to the customer. Instead, it needs to be presented as a generic decline.
lost_card.customer_instructions: You need to contact your bank for more information.

new_account_information_available.description: The card, or account the card is connected to, is invalid.
new_account_information_available.instructions: The customer needs to contact their bank for more information.
new_account_information_available.customer_instructions: You need to contact your bank for more information.

no_action_taken.description: The card has been declined for an unknown reason.
no_action_taken.instructions: The customer should contact their bank for more information.
no_action_taken.customer_instructions: You need to contact your bank for more information.

not_permitted.instructions: The customer needs to contact their bank for more information.
not_permitted.customer_instructions: You need to contact your bank for more information.

pickup_card.description: The card cannot be used to make this payment (it is possible it has been reported lost or stolen).
pickup_card.instructions: The customer needs to contact their bank for more information.
pickup_card.customer_instructions: You need to contact your bank for more information.

pin_try_exceeded.description: The allowable number of PIN tries has been exceeded.
pin_try_exceeded.instructions: The customer must use another card or method of payment.
pin_try_exceeded.customer_instructions: You should use another card or method of payment.

processing_error.description: An error occurred while processing the card.
processing_error.instructions: The payment should be attempted again. If it still cannot be processed, try again later.
processing_error.customer_instructions: The payment should be attempted again. If it still cannot be processed, try again later.

reenter_transaction.description: The payment could not be processed by the issuer for an unknown reason.
reenter_transaction.instructions: The payment should be attempted again. If it still cannot be processed, the customer needs to contact their bank.
reenter_transaction.customer_instructions: The payment should be attempted again. If it still cannot be processed, you need to contact your bank.

restricted_card.description: The card cannot be used to make this payment (it is possible it has been reported lost or stolen).
restricted_card.instructions: The customer needs to contact their bank for more information.
restricted_card.customer_instructions: You need to contact your bank for more information.

revocation_of_all_authorizations.description: The card has been declined for an unknown reason.
revocation_of_all_authorizations.instructions: The customer should contact their bank for more information.
revocation_of_all_authorizations.customer_instructions: You need to contact your bank for more information.

revocation_of_authorization.description: The card has been declined for an unknown reason.
revocation_of_authorization.instructions: The customer should contact their bank for more information.
revocation_of_authorization.customer_instructions: You need to contact your bank for more information.

security_violation.description: The card has been declined for an unknown reason.
security_violation.instructions: The customer needs to contact their bank for more information.
security_violation.customer_instructions: You need to contact your bank for more information.

service_not_allowed.description: The card has been declined for an unknown reason.
service_not_allowed.instructions: The customer should contact their bank for more information.
service_not_allowed.customer_instructions: You need to contact your bank for more information.

stolen_card.description: The payment has been declined because the card is reported stolen.
stolen_card.instructions: The specific reason for the decline should not be reported to the customer. Instead, it needs to be presented as a generic decline.
stolen_card.customer_instructions: You need to contact your bank for more information.

stop_payment_order.description: The card has been declined for an unknown reason.
stop_payment_order.instructions: The customer should contact their bank for more information.
stop_payment_order.customer_instructions: You need to contact your bank for more information.

testmode_decline.description: A Stripe test card number was used.
testmode_decline.instructions: A genuine card must be used to make a payment.
testmode_decline.customer_instructions: A genuine card must be used to make a payment.

transaction_not_allowed.description: The card has been declined for an unknown reason.
transaction_not_allowed.instructions: The customer needs to contact their bank for more information.
transaction_not_allowed.customer_instructions: You need to contact your bank for more information.

try_again_later.description: The card has been declined for an unknown reason.
try_again_later.instructions: Ask the customer to attempt the payment again. If subsequent payments are declined, the customer should contact their bank for more information.
try_again_later.customer_instructions: The payment should be attempted again. If it still cannot be processed, you need to contact your bank.

withdrawal_count_limit_exceeded.description: The customer has exceeded the balance or credit limit available on their card.
withdrawal_count_limit_exceeded.instructions: The customer should use an alternative payment method.
withdrawal_count_limit_exceeded.customer_instructions: You should use an alternative payment method.
